body.name: Betterhood 67" Tall Bathroom Storage Cabinet, Freestanding Linen Cabinet with Glass Doors and Shelves, Large Bathroom Pantry Cabinet with 2 Drawers for Living Room, Kitchen, Dining Room, Office, White
features: Multifunctional Cabinet: This bathroom cabinet is sure to be the perfect suitable choice ,can not only be placed in the bathroom,but also suitable for other rooms. A great addition to any bathroom, kitchen,or living space ,can be used as storage floor cabinet, display shelf,bookcase,bathroom storage,cosmetic storage

Powerful Storage: This large floor cabinet with 2 drawers & 2 cabinets with doors（interior adjustable shelves）can help you sort lots of daily necessities into an organized collection, it’s a perfect way to gain extra storage space.You can store towels, body wash, toothpaste, toothbrushes and wash supplies , easy to use and keep dust-proof

Minimalist Style: The storage cabinet minimalist design will work seamlessly with the rest of your home furniture for a polished look. Clean straight lines in white make the cabinet more elegant and beautiful, which can easily blend in various decoration styles. Glass matches with a silver knob, this linen cabinet adds a modern appeal and creates a cozy vibe

Sturdy & Safety:The storage cabinet is made of high-quality MDF, the overall structure isn't easy to shake. The product included an Anti-Tip Kit, it can provide a positive and reliable lock for the tower cabinet, creating a safe environment for your kids and pets. The glass doors are made of tempered glass, it’s sturdy and safe

Easy to Install: It's easy to put together with detailed, step-by-step assembly instructions and numbered accessories, just taking about 35 minutes, you can get a practical storage display cabinet.Assembled dimensions:23.6" L x 11.8" D x 66.9" H If you have any questions, please contact us without hesitation, we will respond in less than 24 hours

Frosted glass doors reveal a hazy beauty. Anti-toppling Device protect your safe. Fixed shelves would hold heavier weights sturdy. Tempered Glass Door The glass doors are made of tempered ground glass,explosion-proof, it’s sturdy and safe. Chic in design and delicate in detail Floor cabinet with 2 drawers & 4 doors Floor cabinet with 2 drawers & 4 doors design,2 large drawers give you a lot of extra space and can be easily removed, you can also remove the drawers yourself if you don't want them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We downsized when we sold and bought a manufactured home. I was used to a large kitchen my husband built for me and all my kitchen paraphernalia. I was short on space in our new home. We bought this for extras and it worked great! It is nice looking, sturdy, and my husband said it was easy to assemble. I’m happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks great, missing a part
reviews.reviewText: Took about 4-5 hours to organize and assemble. It wasn’t difficult but there are a lot of pieces and it takes some time. It’s as sturdy as any of these kind of self-assembled furniture are and it looks really nice. Not sure if I’d want to put anything super heavy in it but I’m using it for a linen cabinet. If you use it as kitchen storage maybe keep the cast iron pans and Dutch ovens somewhere else. Or at least on the very bottom shelf.It was missing the little dowels that hold up the adjustable shelf but everything else was included. I had to pick some up at the hardware store so annoying but not the end of the world. If not for that I’d give 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You Get What You Pay For
reviews.reviewText: This was a pain in the arse, but I needed the specific dimensions for a space in my utility room, and it fits the space perfectly. Looks real nice in there. It took a couple hours to put together by myself because of the sheer number of pieces. This cabinet is the typical fiber board material, you have to be careful not to over-screw in the hardware. -I only did that once, on an inside area that no one will see. I was missing a couple "N" screws, but luckily I had some of my own. One of the cabinet doors is higher than the other because the predrilled starter marks are off center, I will have to go back and fix that next weekend.. but it is in the utility room, so no one is going to care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's worth the money.
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these units for my mom and dad to use in their large bathroom. When they arrived I was worried as one box was very dirty and looked like it sat in water and had dried out. Once I got the box opened, everything was good. The instructions are easy to follow and the only thing I suggest is a third hand when you go to install the doors. The value and sturdiness for the amount paid is very reasonable. The materials are what they are press boards and very thin backing, however, they make up for this with hardware to stiffen the backing and the rest of the materials are supported by additional hardware as well. I found screws that had no threads, however you are given extra of just about all hardware, one to two pieces, so assembly should not be a problem once you get started. As long as you are not in a rush and follow the applications, you get a very worthy product at the end. I recommend them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but a few issues.
reviews.reviewText: Once assembled the cabinet is beautiful and exactly what I wanted. It took me about 3 hours to complete. I could have assembled it quicker but I screwed in a couple pieces incorrectly.There are a few issue:1. This cabinet has a VERY STRONG chemical odor. Thankfully I could store it in my garage it took a week for the odor to dissipate.2. A couple of the screws tops weren't aligned and made it difficult to screw into the board3 Just a note for step 9 don't use a drill as you can see from my picture even on slow speed the nail will pierce the other side

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to our bathroom storage!
reviews.reviewText: This perfect for our bathroom towell storage. Went together quickly and easily. Took one person about an hour. Looks great too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the sturdiness and size of this cabinet. It offers a lot of storage for such a small piece. I don’t like the chemical type smell though, so I don’t know if food should be stored in it. It’s great for extra space and fits really nicely in a small area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The cabinet was simple to put together and they look wonderful!!!
